page.title: 13NAIRN:FASHION
page.content: In Nairn the{shoes}are all mainly slip on ones without straps.The main colours are red,grey,black or white. They are normally all one colour.Some have patterns and some are just plain. They are usually worn with ankle socks or tights. The older people wear long{skirts past their knees.These are often black,brown or beige.They are worn with bat wing{jumpers}or blouses.The batwing jumpers are normally more than 1 colour.White is one of the usual colours.The younger generation(10_15) wear{trousers.Knickerbockers(trousers down to the knees)aren't very popular. Though{jumpsuits}are.These are usually blue or white.Dresses are popular to the little girls from 1_7years of age. Mini dresses are worn to discos quite a lot.
